Plot of the network of the metabolic variables.

Source: R/plots.R
nc_plot_network.Rd

nc_plot_network(
  .tbl,
  .graph,
  .edge_label_threshold = 0.2,
  .fn_node_rename = NULL
)

Arguments

.tbl

The data that was also used to generate the nc_estimate_network().
.graph

The network graph object of the metabolic variable network.
.edge_label_threshold

Threshold set for edge weight value above which the edge label will be kept. This argument helps to reduce clutter in the graph.
.fn_node_rename

Function to pass to rename the metabolic variables. Preferably use functions that search and replace patterns, like gsub() or stringr::str_replace().

Value

Outputs a ggplot2 object of the metabolic network.

See also

See nc_model_estimates for examples on using NetCoupler.
